description:
Dive into stunning anime art and solve puzzles to enjoy images of lovely girls posing exclusively for you! The visual component of the game is designed in such a way as to convey the feeling of assembling a real puzzle as much as possible. As the difficulty level increases, the images become more piquant. Take your time, enjoy the process and collect all the puzzles.

Features:
• Puzzles with images of lovely girls in seductive outfits
• Simple and addictive game mechanics
• Increasing puzzle difficulty
• Relaxing and atmospheric music
name: Hentai Paradise Vol. 2
